title: Dave Rubin, Civil Religion, New Atheism: the Godlessness that Failed
description:
When I listened to Dave Rubin on Unbelievable I heard a redux of Cold War Civil Religion. What amazed me was that Dave Rubin should have been a trophy of New Atheism but instead exactly the opposite happened. Why? 

Recently Slate Star Codex had a piece "New Atheism: The Godlessness that Failed" which laid out how New Atheism is being consumed by the Church of Social Justice. Dave Rubin perfectly illustrates that as well as how Jordan Peterson marks the end of New Atheism's power and the IDW in many ways its refugees. 

Dave Rubin and John Lennox on Unbelievable Pt 1 https://youtu.be/m0Ov4HBperc Pt. 2 https://youtu.be/Lzm29d2zo_s
Robert Bellah  http://www.robertbellah.com/index.html 
Civil Religion in America http://www.robertbellah.com/articles_5.htm
Habits of the Heart https://amzn.to/2rdhLna
Black Earth https://amzn.to/35WzVrY
Homo Deus https://amzn.to/2OLZ17b
Homo Sapien https://amzn.to/2LmkPUG
Christian Smith Soul Searching https://amzn.to/2r29z9n
SSC New Atheism The Godlessness that Failed https://slatestarcodex.com/2019/10/30/new-atheism-the-godlessness-that-failed/
PVK with James Lindsay https://youtu.be/sZ520OLvDZs
Tom Holland Dominion https://amzn.to/2rUfP2S
David Brooks the Road to Character https://amzn.to/2Pc5Pdt
Eisenhower Sin and Moderation https://paulvanderklay.me/2015/04/29/the-road-to-character-chapter-3-the-eisenhowers-plus-sin-and-moderation/
Rod Dreher Leftists attack 1619 Project https://www.theamericanconservative.com/dreher/attack-on-1619-project-socialists/
Peter Boghossian in Aquila Report https://www.theaquilareport.com/welcome-to-culture-war-2-0-the-great-realignment/
Peter Boghossian James Lindsay the Trojan Horse https://youtu.be/YDFL3xwEEG8
Jordan Peterson Biblical Series https://youtu.be/f-wWBGo6a2w
Mark Noll Biologos Bible as Church on Frontier https://biologos.org/files/modules/noll_scholarly_essay.pdf
